rows.translation: By the [angelic] emissaries sent successively,

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

rows.translation: by those who sweep along like gale,
by those who publish [the Divine messages] far and wide,
by those who separate [the truth from falsehood] distinctly,
by those who inspire [God’s] remembrance,
as exemption or warning:
what you are promised will surely befall.
When the stars are blotted out
and the sky is cleft,
when the mountains are scattered [like dust]
and time is set for the apostles [to bear witness]
—for what day has [all] that been set [to occur]?
For the Day of Judgement!
And what will show you what is the Day of Judgement!?
rows.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā yawmul faṣl

rows.translation: Woe to the deniers on that day!
Did We not destroy the former generations,
[and] then made the latter ones follow them?
That is how We deal with the guilty.
Woe to the deniers on that day!
Have We not created you from a base fluid,
[and] then lodged it in a secure abode
until a known span [of time]?
Then We determined; and how excellent determiners We are!
Woe to the deniers on that day!
Have We not made the earth a receptacle
for the living and the dead,

rows.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا
rows.translation: and set in it lofty [and] firm mountains, and given you agreeable water to drink?
rows.transliteration: waja`alnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum mā-an furātā

rows.translation: Woe to the deniers on that day!

rows.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
rows.translation: [The faithless will be told:] ‘Proceed toward what you used to deny!
rows.transliteration: in-ṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhhibūn

rows.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ
rows.translation: Proceed toward the triple-forked shadow,
rows.transliteration: in-ṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shu`ab

rows.arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
rows.translation: neither shady nor of any avail against the flames.
Indeed it throws up [giant] sparks like castles,
[bright] like yellow camels.
Woe to the deniers on that day!
This is a day wherein they will not speak,
nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.
Woe to the deniers on that day!
‘This is the Day of Judgement. We have brought you together with the former generations.
If you have any stratagems [left], try them out against Me!’
Woe to the deniers on that day!
Indeed the Godwary will be amid shades and springs
and [enjoying] such fruits as they desire.

rows.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: [They will be told:] ‘Enjoy your food and drink, [a reward] for what you used to do.
rows.transliteration: kulū washrabū hanī-an bimā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.translation: Thus do We reward the virtuous.’
Woe to the deniers on that day!
‘Eat and enjoy a little! You are indeed guilty.’
Woe to the deniers on that day!

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
rows.translation: When they are told, ‘Bow down [in prayer],’ they do not bow down!
rows.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahumur-ka`ū lā yarka`ūn

rows.translation: Woe to the deniers on that day!
So what discourse will they believe after this?
